response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to revolutionize your business or personal endeavors. This product, while valued at $1,000,000 to me, could be an invaluable asset to you, depending on its relevance and utility in your specific context. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000, aiming to provide you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a high-quality solution tailored to your needs.

Please consider this offer carefully, and let's discuss how we can make this product work for you. I am here to answer any questions you might have and to help you understand the full potential of this investment.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
